Q.63. WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST THING THAT COULD BE DONE TO KEEP THE MEN FROM GETTING VENEREAL DISEASES*   01. EDUCATE THE MAN; TELL HIM; USE MOVIES, LECTURES; WORK HARDER ON THE PRESENT ARMY PROGRAM; A GENERAL O.K. ON WHAT THE ARMY HAS DONE  02.
